def cmd(cmd, _stdin=None):
    import os
    _i, _o = "__in__", "__out__"
    open(_i, 'w').write(text)
    res = os.system("%s < %s > %s" % (cmd, _i, _o))
    text = open(_o, 'r').read()
    os.system("rm %s %s" % (_i, _o)
    return res, text
alfredsnippet.name: run shell command
